myApps.description: A wish list app built in SwiftUI that allows users to create, manage, and share wish lists with others. Foster uses the Firebase API for universal links, user authentication, and backend data storage. SFSafariViewController is leverage to open hyperlinks within the app so gifts can be viewed and purchased all in one place.
myApps.name: Foster

myApps.description: A miniamlist calendar app with a unique aesthetic and beaufitul animations built using MatchedGeometryEffect. User data is saved and loaded using Apple's CloudKit framework. The MapKit framework is incorporated so the user can include an address or geographic location with their calendar events.
myApps.name: GridPlan

myApps.description: An open source app build in SwiftUI to plot the latest COVID-19 statistics. JSON data is fetched, parsed, and plotted from the COVID Tracking Project API. Filter trends based on location and data criteria (positive cases, negative cases, deaths, etc.), and recent filter options are saved using UserDefaults. COVID Chart also includes a medium and a large widget that can be included on the home screen for quick viewing, all using WidgetKit.
myApps.name: COVID Chart

jobs.title: Electro-Mechanical Engineer
jobs.description: Provide technical support to troubleshoot failures as well as lead development of new or redesigned hydromechanical pumps/metering units and power steering motors used on aerospace applications. Manage projects of varying complexity from start to finish and communicate progress with leadership. Generate and execute test plans to troubleshoot field issues, analyze performance trends, drive continuous improvement, and support prototype development. Collaborate as a multi disciplinary engineer to resolve issues and develop proactive solutions for pumps, metering units, motors, electrical sensors, test stands, and other hydromechanical devices. Analyze test data and build tools using Excel/VBA to assist in manufacturing and organization.

jobs.title: Structural Analysis Engineer
jobs.description: Performed structural analysis on turbofan engine components with Finite Element Analysis software (ANSYS). - Built and ran analytical models, debugged convergence issues, generated scripts to modify raw data files (Perl, Excel), analyzed results, and communicated conclusions in technical reports.

projects.title: Capstone Aircraft Senior Design Project
projects.subtitle: Remote Controlled Seagliding Aircraft
projects.description: Worked on a team to design, construct, test, and fly a remote controlled sea gliding aircraft capable of a rapidly deployable rocket launch, transition to powered flight, water landing, submersion, and sea gliding operation. Detailed design, component procurement, CNC machining, composite fabrication, 3D printing, wind tunnel testing, basic circuits, and analytical analysis.

aboutMeInfo.bio: Hello, I'm Jeremy. I'm an aerospace engineer by degree, an electro-mechanical engineer by practice, and an iOS developer by night.
aboutMeInfo.hobbiesDescription: Reading, drawing, coffee, running, getting injured, not running anymore, cooking, eating.
